Package com.neu.prattle.service

Interface MessageService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageServiceImpl
    public interface MessageService
    Handles all database interactions for CRUD operations of Message objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Message createMessage​(Message message)
      Creates/saves a new Message
      void deleteMessage​(Message message)
      Deletes a message from the database
      java.util.List<Message> getDirectMessages​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String sender)
      Returns a List of all messages sent to a User from another User
      java.util.List<Message> getGroupMessages​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String group)
      Returns a List of all messages sent to a User from a Group
      java.util.List<Message> getUserMessages​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns a List of all Messages sent to a User
      boolean isTest()
      Determines if an instance of MessageService should be configured to use test DB or not

    • Method Detail

      • deleteMessage

        void deleteMessage​(Message message)
        Deletes a message from the database
        Parameters:
        message - is the message to be deleted

      • createMessage

        Message createMessage​(Message message)
        Creates/saves a new Message
        Parameters:
        message - message to be created
        Returns:
        the newly saved Message

      • isTest

        boolean isTest()
        Determines if an instance of MessageService should be configured to use test DB or not
        Returns:
        true if test DB, false if not

      • getUserMessages

        java.util.List<Message> getUserMessages​(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a List of all Messages sent to a User
        Parameters:
        username - of the user whose messages are to be retrieved
        Returns:
        A List of all messages sent to a User

      • getDirectMessages

        java.util.List<Message> getDirectMessages​(java.lang.String user,
                                          java.lang.String sender)
        Returns a List of all messages sent to a User from another User
        Parameters:
        user - is the username of the User who is the recipient of messages
        sender - is the username of the User who is the sender of messages
        Returns:
        a List of messages sent from sender to user if there are any

      • getGroupMessages

        java.util.List<Message> getGroupMessages​(java.lang.String user,
                                         java.lang.String group)
        Returns a List of all messages sent to a User from a Group
        Parameters:
        user - is the username of the recipient
        group - is the name of the sending group
        Returns:
        a List of messages if sent from a Group to a User
